title: raamaa srI raamaa jitha
sahitya:
rAma shrI rAma jita rAma gata kAma

caraNam 1

 dEva Emi dOva nannu brOva vEga rAdA
   
caraNam 2

 bAla bhakta pAla suguNa shIla tALa jAla
   
caraNam 3

 dhIra su-sharIra nirvikAra ElukOrA
   
caraNam 4

 Adarinca rAdA nammalEdA mariyAdA
   
caraNam 5

 Aru ripula pOru dIrcuvAru evarunnAru
   
caraNam 6

 rAyA manasu rAyA munigEya tALadAya
   
caraNam 7

 vAtu kArAdu ikamendu gati lEdu
   
caraNam 8

 cinta dIrcuTa kenta sEvinca shrIkAnta
   
caraNam 9

 shrI nAdAvanilOna iTlu gAna nijamEna
 
caraNam 10

 paddu tappavaddu I poddu marava vaddu
 
caraNam 11

 binna brOcE nanna brOvakunna viDa nanna
 
caraNam 12

 shrI jAnaki rAja tyAgarAja krta pUja
